Summary: UFO's every clear night - UFO highway
divs: Sighting DetailsEvery night I take a walk to the park around 10:30pm. For the past 3 months, I have seen many different types of crafts that are clearly not Earth made. I mostly see a Triangle shaped UFO about the size of a football field. This UFO has 3 white lights on the bottom three corners. I have also seen a Disc shaped UFO, with a bubble on the bottom of the ship. This ship had several lights on the bottom , white, amber, green, red. As the ship headed north east, it started to climb and I clearly saw what looked like windows! If someone wants to call me I will be more than willing to explain each of these occurances in full, as well as others, but I do not have enough time to explain all of them. I am a Mufon member.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Dalton
There were no other sightings in Dalton on or around June 23rd 2006
